name: Studio Računala obrt za usluge vl. Ilija Tadić
legal: SME - paušalni obrt (micro social enterprise in CROATIA)
memberOrga: soon in the near future, probably next year...
goal:
Top priority is employment of persons with disabilities and Croatian war veterans, and the effort is to carry out a social entrepreneurship in CROATIA that seeks to involve vulnerable people in order to make our better society, and ideal that is in line with the vision and objectives of the European Commission.

Najvažnije je zapošljavanje osoba s invaliditetom i hrvatskih branitelja, a nastojanja su da se provede socijalno poduzetništvo u HRVATSKOJ koje nastoji uključiti ranjive ljude kako bi naše društvo bilo bolje i idealno što je u skladu s vizijom i ciljevima Europske komisije.
interests: Borders and Security, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Sport, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
Social Business Initiative (SBI)
Programme for Employment and Social Innovation (EaSI)
European Fund for Strategic Investments (EFSI)
